premierepages.questionapp: Which applications do you want to use ?

pageaccueil.p: Estimate the price of your property in less than 5 minutes! Thanks to our database composed of more than 20 million properties, and our artificial intelligence that will determine the most approximate price of your property.

indicateurs.p: The answers to all the questions about a property location !

indicateur1.li1: What is the average price nearby ?
indicateur1.li2: What are the recent real estate sales in the area ?
indicateur1.li3: How is the rental demand for this address evolving ?

indicateur2.li1: When does the sun rise at this address ?
indicateur2.li3: Am I exposed to air or electromagnetic pollution ?

indicateur3.li1: How much is my property worth ?
indicateur3.li3: How to make accurate estimates taking into account all relevant indicators ?

indicateur4.li1: What schools are near the property ?
indicateur4.li3: Is the property well served by public transportation ?

indicateur5.li1: How far is the nearest bakery by foot ?
indicateur5.li2: Is there a shopping center nearby ?
indicateur5.li3: Is a park within walking distance ?

indicateur6.li1: What is the quality of my network ?
indicateur6.li2: Does the property use fiber optics ?
indicateur6.li3: How good is the 4G/5G coverage at this address ?

indicateur7.li1: Where is the nearest police station ?
indicateur7.li3: Are there any doctors in the neighborhood ?

indicateur8.li1: Is the neighborhood reasonably wealthy or popular ?
indicateur8.li2: What is the general situation of the residents ?

contact.h6: Do you have a question ? Any advice ?
contact.demande: Enter the subject of your request

404.h2: Sorry, the address you requested cannot be found
404.p: Sorry, the page you requested was not found. The link you used may be broken or you may have typed the address (URL) incorrectly.

conditionutilisateur.commentairesP:
When you leave a comment on our site, the data entered in the comment form, as well as your IP address and browser user agent, is collected to help us detect unwanted comments.
            An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be sent to the Gravatar service to verify your use of the service. The privacy policy of the Gravatar service is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After your comment is validated, your profile picture will be publicly visible next to your comment.
conditionutilisateur.médiaP: If you upload images to the site, we recommend that you avoid uploading images that contain EXIF data of GPS coordinates. People visiting your site can download and extract location data from these images.
conditionutilisateur.cookiesP:
If you leave a comment on our site, you will be asked to save your name, email address, and site in cookies. This is only for your convenience so that you do not have to enter this information if you leave another comment later. These cookies expire after one year.
            If you go to the login page, a temporary cookie will be created to determine if your browser accepts cookies. It does not contain any personal information and will be deleted automatically when you close your browser.
            When you log in, we will set a number of cookies to store your login information and screen preferences. A login cookie lasts for two days and a screen preference cookie lasts for one year. If you check "Remember me", your login cookie will be retained for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookie will be deleted.
            By editing or publishing a post, an additional cookie will be stored in your browser. This cookie does not include any personal data. It simply indicates the ID of the publication you just edited. It expires after one day.
conditionutilisateur.contenueembarquéP:
Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles...). Embedded content from other sites behaves in the same way as if the visitor were on that other site.
            These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed third-party tracking tools, and track your interactions with such embedded content if you have an account with their website.
conditionutilisateur.utilisationettransmission: Use and transmission of your personal data
conditionutilisateur.utilisationettransmissionP: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.
conditionutilisateur.duréedestockage: How long your data is stored
conditionutilisateur.duréedestockageP:
If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are kept indefinitely. This allows us to automatically recognize and approve subsequent comments instead of leaving them in the moderation queue.
            For accounts that register with our site (if any), we also store the personal data listed in their profile. All accounts can view, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (with the exception of their user ID). Site managers can also view and edit this information.
conditionutilisateur.droitdonnée: The rights you have over your data
conditionutilisateur.droitdonnéeP: If you have an account or have left comments on the site, you may request to receive a file containing all the personal data we have about you, including the data you have provided to us. You may also request the deletion of your personal data. This does not include data stored for administrative, legal or security purposes.
conditionutilisateur.transmissiondonnéesP: Visitor comments can be checked with an automated comment detection service.
